fiftyone.mobile.servlet

Class Gallery

  • java.lang.Object
    • BaseServlet
      • fiftyone.mobile.servlet.Gallery

  • @WebServlet(name="Gallery",
            urlPatterns="/Gallery")
public class Gallery
extends BaseServlet
    A simple Servlet example showing the image optimiser and bandwidth detection functions. Needs Ultimate Device data.
